title: Detailed Customer Requirements of Travel Information Services, and the Effectiveness of Current Channels
text: Detailed Customer Requirements of Travel Information Services, and the Effectiveness of Current Channels Text Size: Detailed Customer Requirements of Travel Information Services, and the Effectiveness of Current Channels http://www.nzta.govt.nz/assets/resources/research/reports/572/docs/572-detailed-customer-requirements-of-travel-information-services.pdf 173299 Detailed Customer Requirements of Travel Information Services, and the Effectiveness of Current Channels The New Zealand Transport Agency has released a report that discusses market and customer research on its the preferences of its communication preferences of its customers and considers which methods could have the greatest impact on improving the quality of their travel experiences.   10/8/2015
